704207f-a.title: Brooklyn: Flatbush Avenue - Eastern Parkway
704207f-a.text:
Flatbush Ave. (right) south of Eastern Parkway, showing
prominently the9 1,000,O00 political football, that was to have been
the Central Library of Brooklyn, but it was never completed. To the
left, partially seen, is the domed structure, known as the Brooklyn
Institute of Arts and Sciences. The elevated land to the left of the
Library is the Mt. Prospect Reservoir. View No. 2 shows thew 1,000,000
scandal being demolished for the erection of a new library.
January 1, 1937.
View 2: June 12, 1938.
P. L. Sperr.
704207f-a.folder: Flatbush Avenue & Eastern Parkway, Brooklyn, NY
